entry.dcterms:description: the socio-demographic situation of teen-age mothers ten years after giving birth
entry.dcterms:subject: childbearing, family planning and abortion
social conditions and indicators
family life, marriage, relationship
social stratification and groupings
social welfare policy and systems
gender and gender roles
person
survey data
cross-section

1621 successfully reached mothers, 69% of the original sample of 1983 survey organized by the Demographic Research Institute of the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) on the socio-demographic composition of teenage pregnancies.
face-to-face interview
